org.fhnw.aigs.server.common

Class AIGSConsoleHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fhnw.aigs.server.common.AIGSConsoleHandler

  • public class AIGSConsoleHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for console input when the server is run in console mode.
    v1.0 Initial release
    v1.1 Functional changes
    v1.2 Functional changes
    v1.3 Changes of logging
    Version:
    1.3 (Raphael Stoeckli, 24.02.2015)
    Author:
    Matthias St√∂ckli (v1.0)
